alert.note: Alert for Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 19 at 2:21PM PDT until March 22 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 1 to 2 feet above 5000 feet and 2-10 inches between 4000 and 5000 feet are possible. Winds could gust as high as 70 mph on Tuesday. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will mainly be between 4500 and 6500 feet Tuesday before crashing to near or below 4000 feet Tuesday evening into Wednesday.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
